titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Victors valiant : the most spectacular sights & sounds of Michigan football [electronic resource].

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Victors valiant : the most spectacular sights & sounds of Michigan football [electronic resource].

odd.head: Publication, Distribution, Etc.
odd.p: Nashville, Tenn. : Rutledge Hill Press, c2003.

odd.head: Formatted Contents Note
odd.p: 1. "Meechigan" / Bob Ufer -- 2/ Entry Cadence / University of Michigan Marching Band -- 3. Notre Dame wars / Bob Ufer -- 4. "The Victors" / University of Michigan Marching Band -- 5. 5-4-3-2-1 Touchdown! / Bob Ufer -- 6. "Let's go blue" / University of Michigan Marching Band -- 7. General Bo George Patten Schembechler-scoring horn goes wild! / Bob Ufer -- 8. 1979 University of Michigan vs. Indiana University "The play" / Bob Ufer -- 9. A decade of big Bo and little Woody / Bob Ufer -- 10. "The Victors" reprise / University of Michigan Marching Band -- 11. Robert "Frost" Ufer prose in poetry -- 12. 10/16/81 University of Michigan vs. University of Iowa-Bob Ufer's last game / Bob Ufer -- 13. Select photos.
